price: 32. Degenen van wie de zielen door de engelen in vrome staat (tegen hen) worden weggenomen zeggend: “Vrede zij met jullie, ga het paradijs binnen vanwege datgene wat jullie verricht hebben.”
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ طَيِّبِينَ يَقُولُونَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna tatawaffāhumu al-malāikatu ṭayyibīna yaqūlūna salāmun ʿalaykumu ud'khulū al-janata bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
